ingredients.item: 250g pouch Waitrose Microwaveable Basmati Pilau Rice
Â½ x 28g pack coriander, roughly chopped
Fat free natural yogurt to serve

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a frying pan, and fry the aubergine and pepper for 3-4 minutes. Stir in the curry paste, followed by 100ml water and the rice, breaking up any clumps of rice with a spoon. Cover and cook for 2 minutes, stirring occasionally, until piping hot.
Stir in the coriander and serve with a dollop of the natural yogurt.
